title: 이달의소녀탐구 #415 (LOONA TV #415)
summary:
0:01 -- ⅓ ViVi the Android is back. "I have to run soon" as she prepares to run. "I am running faster this time even though I am poor at running"
0:43 -- She is tired after running. "There's no sun in the sy but it is hotter than expected. I had bangs before running however, they are gone now.
0:36 -- She looks at the recording and becomes nostalgic instantly. "I used to look like that~".
ViVi only episode! Hell yeah!
